inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ICU admission for exacerbation of COPD requiring non-invasive ventilatory support

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: diagnosed with acute or chronic neuromuscular disease

inclusion.criterion: chronic mechanical ventilation prior to hospital admission
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: required chronic mechanical ventilation prior to hospital admission

exclusion.criterion: mean arterial pressure <60 mmHg despite infusion of fluids and vasoactive drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: ratio of arterial-to-inspired oxygen O2 fraction (PaO2/FiO2) ≤ 150 with FiO2 of less than 0.6 and PEEP of at least 5 cm H2O
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine. The genetic survey revealed ADAMTS13 >10%. He was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids.
